creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: rectangular body with splayed rim, tapered base and flat foot; handles are two twisted intertwined pieces; exterior covered with leaves and grapes in low relief; text around unornamented base: " John Anstruther Thomson's LANCER by Stanford" on front and "AYR 1825" on back
marks: engraved around bottom edge of foot: [John Anstrut
title: Wine cooler
